abstract: Officials in El Paso, Tex, report fatal shooting at VA Health Care clinic on Fort Bliss Army base; gunman apparently shot doctor at the facility and then killed himself.
lead_paragraph: The shooting took place at the Fort Bliss Army base in El Paso, and the dead included the suspected gunman, officials said.

byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Houston, and Emma G. Fitzsimmons from New York.
byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS

snippet: The shooting took place at the Fort Bliss Army base in El Paso, and the dead included the suspected gunman, officials said.

headline.main: 2 Dead in Shooting at Texas V.A. Clinic
headline.print_headline: 2 Dead in Shooting at a V.A. Clinic
